thread.title: Guan Eng accused of slandering K'tan to cover up fatwa caper
thread.title_full: Guan Eng accused of slandering K'tan to cover up fatwa caper

title: Guan Eng accused of slandering K'tan to cover up fatwa caper
text:
More 
Penang Chief Minister Lim Guan Eng's accusation that Kelantan under PAS is a bankrupt state, is an attempt to divert attention from the controversy over the alleged political interference in the Pearl of the Orient's fatwa management, claims Kelantan PAS Youth. 
"In an effort to divert attention, Lim attacks Kelantan. Maybe in his estimation, by making Kelantan a target, attention can be diverted from Penang and his own big mouth. 
"Though making Kelantan a target will only make him a laughingstock." said the state PAS Youth chief Ahmad Fadhli Shaari in a statement. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
